name: TechCrunch
text:
RT @zackwhittaker: New: New emails show Microsoft aggressively pitched its facial recognition technology to the DEA as far back as 2017. 

Microsoft invited DEA agents to its Virginia offices to demo the tech. The emails show DEA agents even trialed the tech. 

https://t.co/yKdvCDWAep
